ygData.subject: Re: lvl 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Difficult choice.  Best combat spell at that level is Shock Of Lightning.  But if you buy Bind Affinity you can sell binds for 5gp-1pp and make some money
ygData.messageBody:
> Just reached lvl 12. Woohoo. I only have enough money for one spell
> right now. Any suggestions greatly appreciated.
> If you could only buy one lvl 12 spell it would be________??????

Difficult choice. Best combat spell at that level is Shock Of
Lightning. But if you buy Bind Affinity you can sell binds for
5gp-1pp and make some money for other spells.
Other useful spells: Resistant Skin and Halo of Lightning.

Aznyin
Level 12 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
